TopicTitle: How do you connect surface deployable?

Articles.Content:
I can't seem to figure out how to connect them. PLEASE HELP

Edited June 1, 2019 by Thelizard
Connect them when you deploy them on the ground?, they automatically connect to the nearest central station part that is within a 20m radius.
one of the surface deployable parts is labeled "control station", and it needs to be deployed on the suface with the rest of the parts to connect them.
